name: Ariel Vernaza
summary: I'm Ariel Vernaza, a Senior Software Engineer based in Panama City, Panama. My expertise lies in Python, C++, Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Postgres, Kubernetes, and GraphQL. I have a strong background in backend development, AI integration, and optimizing system performance. With a Master's in Game Design and Computer Science specializing in Artificial Intelligence, I bring extensive experience across various programming languages (Python, C++, Ruby, Java, etc.), frameworks (Django, Rails, Next.js, React, etc.), AI tools (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.), and backend technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, etc.). I'm passionate about designing robust software solutions, developing AI systems, and engaging in technical design. In my free time, I enjoy swimming, practicing kendo, and playing action RPG fantasy games.

experience.description: At Farm2Friends, I lead the development of an innovative marketplace connecting producers with consumers using Next.js, TypeScript, React, and MySQL. My responsibilities include planning AI modules for personalized recommendations and user interaction improvements using predictive and behavioral analysis.

Designed and implemented a C++ artificial vision method for a Jetson Nano to process image sequences from a rotating camera and generate a 3D point cloud. Utilized OpenCV for image analysis, feature detection, and advanced image processing techniques to optimize 3D point generation. Ensured accuracy through calibration adjustments, significantly enhancing 3D object reconstruction efficiency.

At Transfix, I developed and released the Transfix Mobile App using Ruby on Rails and React Native. I managed cross-team communication, integrated new map providers using GraphQL, and led the rebranding and update of 'My Loads' and 'Load Details' pages using React, TypeScript, Ruby on Rails, Postgres, Docker, Kubernetes, and GraphQL.

At Adelantos, I specialized in Python, Django, GraphQL, Postgres, and Kubernetes. I led the integration with OXXO payment system in Mexico and DataCrédito in Colombia, and developed an MVP for small businesses with Cervecería Nacional de Panamá.

At Ubiqua, I automated purchase order processing using Ruby on Rails, Python, NLP, regression models, and Kafka. I developed an advanced purchase order processing system and integrated it with client ERP systems.

At the University of Panama, I taught advanced AI and simulation courses using Python, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, and OpenCV. I led research on integrating intelligent agents with physical robots and control systems, and collaborated on interdisciplinary projects.

education.institution: Escuela Superior de Arte y Diseño de Andalucía

education.degree: Master’s in Computer Science and Technology with Specialization in Artificial Intelligence
